meanings.definition: The organ in male animals that produces sperm.
meanings.sent1: The spermary is responsible for creating sperm in male animals.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the spermary to understand how sperm is produced.
meanings.sent3: The spermary decided to take a vacation, leaving the male animal in a bit of a pickle.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his work was like a well-oiled spermary, always producing results.
meanings.sent5: The spermary hummed with activity, a factory of tiny swimmers.

meanings.definition: The male reproductive organ in plants that produces pollen.
meanings.sent1: Bees help in transferring pollen from one spermary to another in plants.
meanings.sent2: The spermary of a flower releases pollen to fertilize other flowers.
meanings.sent3: The gardener joked that the spermary of the plant was the busiest bee in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The spermary of the plant was like a painter, spreading color and life everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The spermary of the plant danced in the breeze, spreading its magic pollen.
